LanguageData.VCEF_FishingGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to fish
LanguageData.VCEF_ChooseFishDesc: Choose prefered fish size to catch from those inhabiting this biome. Smaller fish take less time but are less nutritive, while larger fish take longer and are more nutritive. Medium fish are balanced between the two extremes. There is always a chance to catch some different fish or special items
LanguageData.VCEF_CommandAllowFishingDesc: Allow fishing to take place in this fishing zone
LanguageData.VCEF_ZoneSetTo: This zone is set to catch fish of size
LanguageData.VCEF_NoFish: No fish to catch in this biome
